SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.ClientRMI

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.ClientRMI.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, VirtualClient, ConfigurableClient, GameManagementInterface, NetworkManagementInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements VirtualClient, ClientInterface
This class represents the RMI client interface. It extends UnicastRemoteObject in order to let server invoke method on it.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(String nickname)
      This method is used by client to connect to MainServerRMI. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface NetworkManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to register

    • createGame

      public void createGame(String gameName, int numPlayers)
      This method invokes MainServerRMI.disconnect(VirtualClient, String) to notify server that player wants to create a game. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      gameName - the name of the game that will be created.
      numPlayers - the number of players to play with.

    • createGame

      public void createGame(String gameName, int numPlayers, int seed)
      This method invokes MainServerRMI.createGame(VirtualClient, String, String, int, long) to ask server to create a game with the specified seed. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      gameName - the name of the game that will be created.
      numPlayers - the number of players for the game.
      seed - the seed for the game.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect() throws RuntimeException
      This method is used when client has to reconnect to server. It works in all situations, including rebooting the machine.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface NetworkManagementInterface
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when an error happened managing configuration

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect() throws RuntimeException
      This method is used by client to explicitly disconnect from server. It deletes current configuration.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface NetworkManagementInterface
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while invoking method MainServerRMI.disconnect(VirtualClient, String) of MainServerRMI.

      stopClient in interface NetworkManagementInterface

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String cardToInsert, String anchorCard, Direction directionToInsert, CardOrientation orientation)
      This method is used to notify ClientHandlerRMI that a card needs to be placed. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      cardToInsert - the card that needs to be placed.
      anchorCard - the card from which to place the card.
      directionToInsert - the direction from the anchorCard in which player wants to place the card.
      orientation - the orientation in which player wants to place cardToInsert.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(ArrayList<String> usersToSend, String messageToSend)
      This method is used to notify send a chat message. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      sendChatMessage in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      usersToSend - a list containing the nickname of the users to whom player want to send the message.
      messageToSend - the message player wants to send.

    • placeInitialCard

      public void placeInitialCard(CardOrientation cardOrientation)
      This method invoke ClientHandlerRMI.placeInitialCard(CardOrientation) to notify server that player has placed its initial card. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      placeInitialCard in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      cardOrientation - the orientation in which player wants to place the initial card.

    • pickCardFromTable

      public void pickCardFromTable(PlayableCardType type, int position)
      This method invoke ClientHandlerRMI.pickCardFromTable(PlayableCardType, int) to notify server that player wants to pick a card from table. If client is disconnected, then the request is not performed.
      Specified by:
      pickCardFromTable in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      type - the type of card player wants to pick (RESOURCE/GOLD).
      position - the position in the table player wants to take the card from.

      Specified by:
      choosePrivateGoalCard in interface GameManagementInterface
      Parameters:
